Title: Relates to supplementing food and beverage nutrition labels with colors depending on the total amount of the nutrient
Summary: Supplements food and beverage nutrition labels with colors depending on the total amount of total fat, saturated fat, total sugars and sodium in such products.
LawCode: Add ยง214-p, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to supplementing food and beverage nutrient information with colors depending on the total amount of the nutrient in such product
